title: Bankinter advertising / Málaga subway system signage
content:
Both were recently seen in Málaga, Spain

1) [http://www.flickr.com/photos/fermello78/456996977/?rotated=1&cb=11764150...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803105339/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/fermello78/456996977/?rotated=1&cb=1176415077961 "http://www.flickr.com/photos/fermello78/456996977/?rotated=1&cb=1176415077961") (the one used for the number 10 and for the slogan)  
2) [http://www.flickr.com/photos/fermello78/456997731/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803105339/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/fermello78/456997731/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/fermello78/456997731/") (the one in the red background)

Thanks

Fernando
author: fermello78

comments.content: First one looks like a Serif of FF Max.

Second one looks very much like the custom font made for Vodafone by Dalton Maag.  
 [http://www.daltonmaag.com/about/modification/case\_studies/vodafone.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803105339/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/about/modification/case_studies/vodafone.html "http://www.daltonmaag.com/about/modification/case\_studies/vodafone.html")

First one:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/max-demi-serif/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803105339/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/max-demi-serif/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/max-demi-serif/")

Maybe a customized version.
The second one has some Spiekkerman feeling.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/info-display/semibold-roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803105339/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/info-display/semibold-roman/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/info-display/semibold-roman/")

Indeed.  
But, the Info seems to be too much rounded.

The Bankinter logo is definitely at least inspired by [FF Max](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803105339/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_max_ot_semi_bold/&sample_text=bankinter&sample_size=74). Perhaps it is something custom by [Morten Olsen](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803105339/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Morten%20Olsen). I love the slab!
The second is close to FF Info Display, but I'm still not sure, it seems less rounded.
Isn’t that what I said two posts up?

Yes, I think it is.

Thanks
